title: Ranking the ADCs at Worlds
body:
Disclaimer: My opinion, feel free to disagree. You know, the usual.

1. Bang (SKT)
2. Deft (EDG)
3. PraY (ROX)
4. Ruler (SSG)
5. Uzi (RNG)
6. Jinjiao (IMAY)
7. Zven (G2)
8. Doublelift (TSM)
9. Sneaky (C9)
10. Stixxay (CLG)
11. AN (AHQ)
12. Kobbe (SPY)
13. NL (FW)
14. Forgiven (H2K)
15. miCAO (INTZ)
16. aMiracle (ANX)

replies.body:
1. Deft
2. PraY
3. Bang
4. Uzi
5. Doublelift
6. Zven
7. Sneaky
8. Ruler
9. Forgiven
10. Jinjiao
11. AN
12. NL
13. Kobbe
14. Stixxay
15. miCAO
16. aMiracle
Somewhat similar to yours, except for the troll placements that you had, like: Ruler, Forgiven, Kobbe, Stixxay

I pretty much agree with this one, except I would rank Stixxay over Kobbe. I think Stixxay at his best is better than Kobbe at his best, but Stixxay at his worst is worse than Kobbe at his worst, so a floor-ceiling thing for me.

Stixxay number 10 even tho hes have the almost the least experience besides maybe the IWC adc LOL

IDEK how Forgiven, NL, and AN are lower than him when they have more Experience and are much better

1. Sneaky 
2. Snaky
3. Snaky in lane lul
4. Sneaky playing for team liquid

Doublelift was good two years ago... he's grown and looks amazing now. I think he's among the top 5 almost certainly.

Forgiven... on mechanics alone, I'd put him in the top 5 easily. But as an overall player, his arrogance tends to be his downfall, so I think your placement makes sense. He makes plays with disregard for his team, and has caused several teams to completely self-destruct. I doubt this year will be any different for him. 

Aside from that, I think you've got a pretty good list here.

Zven should really be lower.He isn't bad, but he isn't that good.

I would say 

7.Sneaky
8.Doublelift
9.Zven
(I could put them a little higher maybe, but i don't know Ruler,Jinjiao and Deft so yeah...)

Stixay a lot lower too, he really wasn't that great all summer split.

Zven was the only thing that had OG doing good at all when OG was struggling, and he's one of the mains carries that G2 goes to, since Perkz is unreliable, and Expect is pretty bad, but can carry if he's fed the resources.

Being the only thing good on a bad team doesn't make you better than other adc...

Like i said, he is good for sure, but clearly not better than Sneaky or Doublelift.Not sure about forgiven...Would be a close one IMO, but since G2 got 1st EU and H2K second, i'll go with zven ahead of Forgiven.
Yea, Im not sure Bang is #1 anymore.. A year ago, no question. But he has been caught out and killed A LOT lately. The 100 KDA Bang is so last year.
Come on, we all know Forgiven is the best by far, stahp it.
Wtf is ruler doing in the top 5, he's bottom 5 imo
Why is forgiven so low, he should be at #9 with doublelift
I'm sorry but these rankings are pretty funny. So Ruler is better than Uzi and Kobbe is better than Forgiven?
